body_html: I guess the dll files are usually found in the "PATH", not "CUDA_PATH_v9_0". Whenever you cannot find a dll or an exe file during running, first search the file location, and then add the path into "PATH" and restart your console.

body: I guess the dll files are usually found in the "PATH", not "CUDA_PATH_v9_0". Whenever you cannot find a dll or an exe file during running, first search the file location, and then add the path into "PATH" and restart your console.
